hopobject.name: Beagle SecMon
hopobject.body: The system will control one or more digital cameras with pan, tilt and zoom functions, and microphones. Besides, it can be configured to send information to a pre registered cell phone when movement is detected. Also, audio and video can be accessed using internet from any place.
hopobject.shortdesc: This project proposes to control and transmit audio and video from a remote place using the beagleboard as a webserver.
